events.name: Ukrainian forces prepare to hoist flag on Snake Island
events.wd_label: Ukrainian forces prepare to hoist flag on Snake Island
events.wd_description: Ukrainian forces are set to hoist the national flag on Snake Island after Russian troops withdrew, marking a significant moment in the ongoing conflict and strategic efforts to ease Moscow's embargo on Ukrainian ports.
events.description: Ukrainian forces are set to hoist the national flag on Snake Island after Russian troops withdrew, marking a significant moment in the ongoing conflict and strategic efforts to ease Moscow's embargo on Ukrainian ports.

events.name: Russian withdrawal
events.wd_description: Russian troops left Snake Island, citing a "gesture of goodwill" to not impede UN efforts for a humanitarian corridor.
events.description: Russian troops left Snake Island, citing a "gesture of goodwill" to not impede UN efforts for a humanitarian corridor.

events.name: Ukrainian preparations
events.wd_description: Ukrainian forces are preparing to hoist the national flag on Snake Island, though it remains unclear if they will maintain a long-term presence.
events.description: Ukrainian forces are preparing to hoist the national flag on Snake Island, though it remains unclear if they will maintain a long-term presence.

events.name: significance of Snake Island
events.wd_description: Control of Snake Island is viewed by Ukraine as a crucial first step in easing Moscow's embargo on its southern ports, despite the risk of bombing.
events.description: Control of Snake Island is viewed by Ukraine as a crucial first step in easing Moscow's embargo on its southern ports, despite the risk of bombing.

events.name: international attention
events.wd_description: Snake Island gained international attention when Russia originally took control in February, and multiple attempts have been made by Ukraine to recover it.
events.description: Snake Island gained international attention when Russia originally took control in February, and multiple attempts have been made by Ukraine to recover it.

events.name: Controversy over shelling of Donetsk prison holding Ukrainian war prisoners
events.wd_label: Controversy over shelling of Donetsk prison holding Ukrainian war prisoners
events.wd_description: Russia and Ukraine exchanged accusations over the shelling of a prison in Donetsk holding Ukrainian war prisoners, with both sides blaming each other for the deaths of 40 prisoners.
events.description: Russia and Ukraine exchanged accusations over the shelling of a prison in Donetsk holding Ukrainian war prisoners, with both sides blaming each other for the deaths of 40 prisoners.

events.name: Russian defense ministry statement
events.wd_description: Russia's defense ministry claimed that 40 Ukrainian war prisoners were killed by Ukrainian shelling of a prison held by separatists in Donetsk.
events.description: Russia's defense ministry claimed that 40 Ukrainian war prisoners were killed by Ukrainian shelling of a prison held by separatists in Donetsk.

events.name: Ukraine's military response
events.wd_description: Ukraine's military denied carrying out the shelling and accused Russia of shelling the prison to cover up torture and shootings of prisoners.
events.description: Ukraine's military denied carrying out the shelling and accused Russia of shelling the prison to cover up torture and shootings of prisoners.

events.name: DPR spokesperson statement
events.wd_description: Daniil Bezsonov, a spokesperson for the Russian-backed separatist Donetsk People’s Republic, claimed the strike was a direct hit on a barracks holding prisoners.
events.description: Daniil Bezsonov, a spokesperson for the Russian-backed separatist Donetsk People’s Republic, claimed the strike was a direct hit on a barracks holding prisoners.

events.name: accusation of US-made artillery use
events.wd_description: The Russian defense ministry claimed that US-made Himars artillery was used in the operation and accused Ukraine of a deliberate provocation.
events.description: The Russian defense ministry claimed that US-made Himars artillery was used in the operation and accused Ukraine of a deliberate provocation.

events.name: Ranil Wickremesinghe elected President of Sri Lanka
events.wd_label: Ranil Wickremesinghe elected President of Sri Lanka
events.wd_description: Former Sri Lanka Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe was elected President by lawmakers amid ongoing protests demanding his removal due to his association with former President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
events.description: Former Sri Lanka Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe was elected President by lawmakers amid ongoing protests demanding his removal due to his association with former President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.

events.name: election of Wickremesinghe
events.wd_description: Ranil Wickremesinghe, a six-time former prime minister and ally of Gotabaya Rajapaksa, was elected President of Sri Lanka by lawmakers, receiving 134 out of 223 votes.
events.description: Ranil Wickremesinghe, a six-time former prime minister and ally of Gotabaya Rajapaksa, was elected President of Sri Lanka by lawmakers, receiving 134 out of 223 votes.

events.name: Wickremesinghe's address
events.wd_description: After being elected, Wickremesinghe addressed the country, emphasizing the need for unity and cooperation despite the division along party lines.
events.description: After being elected, Wickremesinghe addressed the country, emphasizing the need for unity and cooperation despite the division along party lines.

events.name: protest against Wickremesinghe
events.wd_description: A small group of protesters gathered at the president's residence to protest Wickremesinghe's nomination during the voting process.
events.description: A small group of protesters gathered at the president's residence to protest Wickremesinghe's nomination during the voting process.

events.name: Volkswagen's EV battery supply chain strategy
events.wd_label: Volkswagen's EV battery supply chain strategy
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is investing $20.38 billion to build electric vehicle batteries, creating 20,000 jobs and generating $20.38 billion in annual sales through its new company, Power Co.
events.description: Volkswagen is investing $20.38 billion to build electric vehicle batteries, creating 20,000 jobs and generating $20.38 billion in annual sales through its new company, Power Co.

events.name: establishment of Power Co
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has created a new company, Power Co, to oversee its entire battery supply chain, from R&D to raw material mining and recycling.
events.description: Volkswagen has created a new company, Power Co, to oversee its entire battery supply chain, from R&D to raw material mining and recycling.

events.name: battery production plants
events.wd_description: Power Co will manage the construction of six battery cell production plants in Europe by 2030, including plants in Germany, Sweden, Spain, and Eastern Europe, with plans for gigafactories in North America.
events.description: Power Co will manage the construction of six battery cell production plants in Europe by 2030, including plants in Germany, Sweden, Spain, and Eastern Europe, with plans for gigafactories in North America.

events.name: Salzgitter plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has begun construction on its first battery plant in Salzgitter, Germany.
events.description: Volkswagen has begun construction on its first battery plant in Salzgitter, Germany.

events.name: Skelleftea plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is building a battery production plant in Skelleftea, Sweden.
events.description: Volkswagen is building a battery production plant in Skelleftea, Sweden.

events.name: Valencia plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen will establish a battery production plant in Valencia, Spain.
events.description: Volkswagen will establish a battery production plant in Valencia, Spain.

events.name: Eastern Europe plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen plans to build a battery production plant in Eastern Europe.
events.description: Volkswagen plans to build a battery production plant in Eastern Europe.

events.name: North America gigafactories
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is exploring plans to build future gigafactories in North America.
events.description: Volkswagen is exploring plans to build future gigafactories in North America.

events.name: unified prismatic cell design
events.wd_description: Starting in 2023, Volkswagen will roll out a new unified prismatic cell design for its batteries, aiming to power 80% of its electric vehicles by 2030.
events.description: Starting in 2023, Volkswagen will roll out a new unified prismatic cell design for its batteries, aiming to power 80% of its electric vehicles by 2030.

events.name: partnerships and investments
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has contracts with major battery producers Samsung and CATL, and is investing in QuantumScape, a startup working on solid-state batteries.
events.description: Volkswagen has contracts with major battery producers Samsung and CATL, and is investing in QuantumScape, a startup working on solid-state batteries.

events.name: partnerships with Samsung and CATL
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has established contracts with Samsung and CATL for battery production.
events.description: Volkswagen has established contracts with Samsung and CATL for battery production.

events.name: investment in QuantumScape
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is backing QuantumScape, a startup based in San Jose, California, that is developing energy-efficient solid-state batteries.
events.description: Volkswagen is backing QuantumScape, a startup based in San Jose, California, that is developing energy-efficient solid-state batteries.
